perform(A) - Method in class MPC.Phase
Call to invoke the phase, i.e., to perform its actions, with an argument; override this method to support it in a specific subclass.
perform() - Method in class MPC.Phase
Call to invoke the phase, i.e., to perform its actions, with no argument; override this method to support it in a specific subclass.
Phase<R,A> - Class in MPC
This abstract class provide a standard way of instantiating and invoking a phase of the Mini-Pascal compiler.

pos - Variable in class MPC.ScanInStream
current file position in the InputStream; the first character is at position 0
pos - Variable in error MPC.SemanticException
Source position (-1 if none) of the semantic problem
printFinish() - Method in class MPC.MPCStream
finish a construct by print a close parenthesis and decreasing indentation by one step.
printIndent() - Method in class MPC.MPCStream
concludes the current output line and prints spaces to indent the next line
printStart(String) - Method in class MPC.MPCStream
for starting to print an indented/nested construct; outputs an open parenthesis, then the given String, then increases indentation by one step.
printUsage(PrintStream) - Static method in class MPC.mpc
Prints a "usage" message, describing how to invoke mpc and the available command line arguments and flags.

put(int, E) - Method in class MPC.IntMap
method for adding a key/value pair to the map; it ASSUMES the key is not already present!
